greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: matrix product A054525 * A127648.
example: First few rows of the triangle are;
maple: A127648 := proc(n,k) if n = k then n; else 0 ; fi; end:
A054525 := proc(n,k) if k = n then 1; elif n mod k = 0 then numtheory[mobius](n/k) ; else 0 ; fi; end:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Jan 14 2007
ext: Converted comments to formulas, extended - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 11 2009
Corrected A-number typo in a formula - _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 17 2009
Corrected last example line by _John Mason_, Jan 07 2015
